headline: 5 Ideal 'Safer' Dividend Buys From Bloomberg's June Watch List
summary: Read here for an analysis of 15 dividend stocks with safer criteria, yielding solid returns by 2026. Learn strategic picks, ideal for income investors.

headline: This Dividend King Just Announced a Quarterly Dividend
summary: Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) is one of the best stocks for a retirement stock portfolio. On June 12, the company announced that its Board of Directors has approved a quarterly cash dividend of $0.52 per share, which will be paid on August 15, 2025, to shareholders on record as of July 18, 2025.
